question: Покажи всех активных сотрудников
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, department_id, salary_grade, hire_date FROM employee WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с зарплатой выше 100000
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id, salary_grade FROM employee WHERE salary > 100000 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи список всех департаментов
sql: SELECT id, name, manager_id, cost_center, budget FROM department WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников из отдела продаж
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.email, e.salary_grade, e.salary FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id WHERE d.name = 'Sales' AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с грейдом D1
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, hire_date, department_id FROM employee WHERE salary_grade = 'D1' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, нанятых в этом году
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, hire_date, department_id, salary_grade FROM employee WHERE YEAR(hire_date) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все активные спецификации (BOM)
sql: SELECT id, product_id, version, status, created_at, created_by FROM bom WHERE status = 'active' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все компоненты для спецификации с ID 5
sql: SELECT material_id, component_type, quantity_per_unit, unit_of_measure, cost_per_unit, cost_currency FROM bom_component WHERE bom_id = 5 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все программы обучения
sql: SELECT id, name, duration_days, is_mandatory, description FROM training_program WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, прошедших обучение по 'Safety Training'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.department_id, et.completion_date, et.grade FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Safety Training' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';

question: Покажи текущую структуру окладов
sql: SELECT grade, step, base_salary, salary_currency, effective_date FROM salary_structure WHERE effective_date <= CURDATE() AND (expiration_date IS NULL OR expiration_date >= CURDATE()) AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников без указанных данных о грейде
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id, hire_date FROM employee WHERE salary_grade IS NULL AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все завершённые курсы обучения за текущий месяц
sql: SELECT employee_id, program_id, enrollment_date, completion_date, grade FROM employee_training WHERE enrollment_status = 'completed' AND MONTH(completion_date) = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(completion_date) = YEAR(CURDATE());

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у кого зарплата ниже 80000
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary, department_id, salary_grade FROM employee WHERE salary < 80000 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, работающих в Москве
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, department_id, salary_grade, salary FROM employee WHERE location = 'Moscow' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи все компоненты типа 'metal'
sql: SELECT bom_id, material_id, quantity_per_unit, cost_per_unit FROM bom_component WHERE component_type = 'raw_material' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи среднюю зарплату по компании
sql: SELECT ROUND(AVG(salary), 2) as avg_salary FROM employee WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи количество сотрудников в компании
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as employee_count FROM employee WHERE is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с фамилией Иванов
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email, department_id, salary, salary_grade FROM employee WHERE last_name = 'Иванов' AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников из IT-отдела
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.email, e.salary_grade FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id WHERE d.name = 'IT' AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников с должностью 'Менеджер'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.salary FROM employee e JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.id WHERE p.name = 'Менеджер' AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые работают в компании более 5 лет
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, hire_date, DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), hire_date) / 365 as years_in_company FROM employee WHERE DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), hire_date) > 1825 AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у которых оклад выше среднего
sql: SELECT id, first_name, last_name, salary FROM employee WHERE salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employee WHERE is_active = true) AND is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые были повышены в этом году
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.salary_grade, pr.review_date FROM employee e JOIN performance_review pr ON e.id = pr.employee_id WHERE pr.review_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND pr.promotion_recommendation = 'yes' AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у которых есть сертификаты
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, et.certificate_number, et.certificate_date FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id WHERE et.certificate_issued = true AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые прошли обучение по 'Leadership Training'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, et.completion_date FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Leadership Training' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у которых есть премиальные схемы
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, bs.name as bonus_scheme FROM employee e JOIN bonus_scheme bs ON e.company_id = bs.company_id WHERE e.bonus_eligible = true AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые работают в производственном подразделении
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, pl.name as plant_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id JOIN plant pl ON d.business_unit_id = pl.id WHERE pl.name IS NOT NULL AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у которых есть план развития
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, pr.development_plan, pr.next_review_date FROM employee e JOIN performance_review pr ON e.id = pr.employee_id WHERE pr.development_plan IS NOT NULL AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые прошли обучение по 'Quality Control'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, et.completion_date, et.grade FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Quality Control' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у которых есть доступ к критическому оборудованию
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, m.name as machine_name FROM employee e JOIN machine ma ON e.department_id = ma.work_center_id JOIN machine m ON ma.id = m.id WHERE m.criticality_level = 5 AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые прошли обучение по 'Safety Procedures'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, et.completion_date FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Safety Procedures' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';

sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, p.name as position_name FROM employee e JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.id WHERE p.is_management = true AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, у которых есть доступ к системам управления рисками
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, d.name as department_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.id WHERE d.name = 'Risk Management' AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые прошли обучение по 'Risk Assessment'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, et.completion_date FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Risk Assessment' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';

sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, p.name as position_name FROM employee e JOIN position p ON e.position_id = p.id WHERE p.name LIKE '%Metrics%' AND e.is_active = true;

question: Покажи всех сотрудников, которые прошли обучение по 'Metrics Management'
sql: SELECT e.id, e.first_name, e.last_name, et.completion_date, et.grade FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.id = et.employee_id JOIN training_program tp ON et.program_id = tp.id WHERE tp.name = 'Metrics Management' AND et.enrollment_status = 'completed';
